statements: SELECT project_name, total_cost FROM production_costs_and_material_usage_reports WHERE material_used = 'Concrete'
SELECT * FROM production_costs_and_material_usage_reports ORDER BY material_cost DESC
SELECT project_name, labor_cost FROM production_costs_and_material_usage_reports WHERE total_cost > 10000
SELECT * FROM production_costs_and_material_usage_reports WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT project_name, material_used FROM production_costs_and_material_usage_reports WHERE labor_cost > 5000
SELECT project_id, project_name, material_used, material_cost, labor_cost, total_cost FROM production_costs_and_material_usage_reports ORDER BY project_id DESC;

SELECT project_name, SUM(material_cost) AS total_material_cost, SUM(labor_cost) AS total_labor_cost, SUM(total_cost) AS total_project_cost FROM production_costs_and_material_usage_reports GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM production_costs_and_material_usage_reports WHERE total_cost > 5000 ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, CONCAT('Material Cost: $', material_cost, ' | Labor Cost: $', labor_cost) AS cost_breakdown FROM production_costs_and_material_usage_reports;

SELECT project_name, AVG(material_cost) AS average_material_cost, AVG(labor_cost) AS average_labor_cost FROM production_costs_and_material_usage_reports GROUP BY project_name HAVING AVG(total_cost) < 10000;
SELECT * FROM production_costs WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT project_id, cost FROM production_costs WHERE cost > 100
SELECT project_id, material_id, cost FROM production_costs ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT project_id, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM material_usage GROUP BY project_id
SELECT project_id, AVG(cost) as avg_cost FROM production_costs GROUP BY project_id
SELECT project_id, material_id, cost FROM production_costs WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY project_id ASC
SELECT project_id, material_id, quantity FROM material_usage WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY project_id DESC
SELECT * FROM production_costs JOIN material_usage ON production_costs.project_id = material_usage.project_id WHERE production_costs.material_id = 1 AND material_usage.quantity > 5
SELECT project_id, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM production_costs GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_cost > 500 ORDER BY total_cost DESC

SELECT project_id, material_id, cost FROM production_costs UNION SELECT project_id, material_id, quantity * cost AS total_cost FROM material_usage JOIN production_costs ON material_usage.material_id = production_costs.material_id
SELECT * FROM PrintingProjects;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM PrintingProjects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM PrintingProjects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, material_type, material_quantity FROM MaterialUsage WHERE material_quantity > 100;
SELECT project_id, total_cost FROM ProductionCosts WHERE total_cost < 5000;
SELECT project_id, material_cost, personnel_cost, total_cost FROM ProductionCosts ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT project_id, material_type, material_quantity, material_unit FROM MaterialUsage WHERE material_quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_quantity ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM PrintingProjects WHERE project_id = 5;
SELECT project_id, material_type, material_quantity, material_unit FROM MaterialUsage WHERE material_type LIKE '%paper%' ORDER BY project_id;
SELECT project_id, material_cost + personnel_cost AS total_budget FROM ProductionCosts WHERE total_cost < 5000 ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, production_cost, material_used FROM project_cost_report;
SELECT material_id, material_name, cost_per_unit FROM material_supply ORDER BY cost_per_unit DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, production_cost FROM project_cost_report WHERE production_cost > 5000;
SELECT project_id, material_id, quantity_used FROM project_material_usage WHERE project_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM project_status WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, production_cost FROM project_cost_report;
SELECT project_name, production_cost, material_used FROM project_cost_report WHERE production_cost > 5000;
SELECT * FROM material_supply ORDER BY cost_per_unit DESC;

SELECT pc.project_name, ms.material_name, pmu.quantity_used FROM project_cost_report pc JOIN project_material_usage pmu ON pc.project_id = pmu.project_id JOIN material_supply ms ON pmu.material_id = ms.material_id;

SELECT pc.project_name, pmu.quantity_used, ps.status FROM project_cost_report pc JOIN project_material_usage pmu ON pc.project_id = pmu.project_id JOIN project_status ps ON pc.project_id = ps.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date FROM Projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM Projects WHERE project_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Materials WHERE material_cost_per_unit < 10.00;
SELECT printer_name, printer_type FROM Printers WHERE printer_purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM Projects
SELECT * FROM Materials WHERE material_cost_per_unit > 100
SELECT printer_name, printer_type FROM Printers ORDER BY printer_purchase_date DESC
SELECT project_name, cost_description, cost_amount FROM Projects JOIN ProductionCosts ON Projects.project_id = ProductionCosts.cost_project_id

SELECT Projects.project_name, Materials.material_name, usage_quantity_used FROM Projects JOIN MaterialUsage ON Projects.project_id = MaterialUsage.usage_project_id JOIN Materials ON MaterialUsage.usage_material_id = Materials.material_id
